syllabus_info.syllabus_name: Cambridge International AS & A Level Chemistry 9701

subtopic.sub_topic_name: Physical properties of the Group 17 elements

learning_objectives.description: describe the colours and the trend in volatility of chlorine, bromine and iodine
describe and explain the trend in the bond strength of the halogen molecules
interpret the volatility of the elements in terms of instantaneous dipole-induced dipole forces
